name: Xmas Things
description:
Watch out Santa!

The naughty children want to steal your presents,
while you try to outmanoeuvre them.

Deliver the presents at all costs.

This was made for the Yogscast game jam under 47 hours.

How to play:

W,A,S,D to move
space bar to jump
F to interact
G to open menu
You must find all the presents
and deliver them to the Christmas trees.

If the game breaks, you can always restart it with G.
I appreciate all who download the game and play it.
